meanings.sent1: She expects good weather for the picnic.
meanings.sent2: He expects his package to arrive tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The cat expects treats whenever the doorbell rings.
meanings.sent4: The farmer expects a bountiful harvest after a season of hard work.
meanings.sent5: The student expects to ace the exam after studying diligently.

meanings.definition: To anticipate or look forward to
meanings.sent1: The children expect their birthday party with excitement.
meanings.sent2: I expect a fun time at the concert tonight.
meanings.sent3: The puppy expects playtime as soon as the leash comes out.
meanings.sent4: She expects a bright future ahead of her.
meanings.sent5: He expects a delicious meal at his favorite restaurant.

meanings.sent1: The job expects employees to be punctual.
meanings.sent2: The contract expects timely completion of the project.
meanings.sent3: The recipe expects fresh ingredients for the best taste.
meanings.sent4: The law expects citizens to follow the rules.
meanings.sent5: The teacher expects students to hand in their assignments on time.
